thread.title: Assassins 'took FIVE SECONDS to poison Kim Jong-nam'
thread.title_full: Assassins 'took FIVE SECONDS to poison Kim Jong-nam'

title: Assassins 'took FIVE SECONDS to poison Kim Jong-nam'
text: Revealed: Assassins 'took just FIVE SECONDS to poison North Korean leader Kim Jong-un's brother after distracting him at airport check-in desk Attack on Kim Jong-nam by 'North Korean hit squad' lasted just 'five seconds' 'Assassins' had been watching him in terminal and struck when he was in queue One distracted him while second came from behind and locked him in a hold A 'cloth drenched in a chemical' was then 'clamped over Jong-nam's face' Victim, the half-brother of Kim Jong-un, had criticised the North Korean regime Two women and one man have since been arrested by Malaysian police
